name: PurposefulPlanningwithAspenWealthManagement
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Learn, get inspired, and feel empowered about your financial life. Hear tips about money management and true stories about the impact of financial planning on securing stability and financial freedom. At Aspen Wealth, we offer fee-only, customized tax and financial planning services to individuals, families, and small business owners. 

Subscribe free on Alexa Flash Briefing or in any podcast app. 

How to listen: Search for Aspen Wealth on Amazon.com under Alexa Skills, or in your Alexa app under Settings - Flash Briefing. On the Alexa Skill called “Purposeful Planning with Aspen Wealth Management” click “Enable” and say “Alexa, Flash Briefing.”

Topics include: 
Investing
Financial planning
Tax deductions
Budgeting and saving
Retirement savings advice
401k and IRA accounts
Mortgage and insurance advice
And more

Aspen Wealth Management is a registered investment advisor (RIA) based in Forth Worth, Texas.
Visit aspenwealthmgmt.com to learn more.

The content is developed from sources believed to be providing accurate information. The information in this material is not intended as tax or legal advice. Please consult legal or tax professionals for specific information regarding your individual situation.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
